caption.p: A heatmap overview (showing only group average) with hierarchical clustering of the 4,774 cannabis oils. The first cluster (#1) included Bedrocan variety and the second one (#2) the other varieties, which in particular consisted of (#2A) Bedrolite and (#2B) Bediol and FM2. In respect to other varieties, Bedrocan displayed a lower concentration of CBD (tot, neutral, and acid) and Bedrolite of THC (tot and neutral). The color-scale differentiates values as high (red), mid (gray), and low (blue). For details on preparation methods, see the following references: Method A ( Romano and Hazekamp, 2013), Method B ( Citti et al., 2016), Method C [ Societ√† Italiana Farmacisti Preparatori (SIFAP), 2016; Casiraghi et al., 2018], and Method D ( Calvi et al., 2018).
